thing-type.label: Homie Device
thing-type.description: A Device that uses the Homie MQTT Convention V2.0

parameter.name: mqttbrokerurl
parameter.label: MQTT Broker URL
parameter.description: MQTT Broker URL in the format "tcp://myBrokerHost:1883"

channel-type.label: Homie specification Version
channel-type.description: Version of the Homie convention the device conforms to

channel-type.label: Online
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the device is online or not

channel-type.label: Device IP
channel-type.description: Current IP address of the device

channel-type.label: Uptime
channel-type.description: Time in seconds since the device came online

channel-type.label: Signal
channel-type.description: Signal level in percent. Might be not supported by wired devices

channel-type.label: Update Interval
channel-type.description: Interval (in seconds) at which the uptime and signal are refreshed

channel-type.label: Firmware Name
channel-type.description: Name of the firmware running on the device

channel-type.label: Firmware Version
channel-type.description: Version of the firmware running on the device

channel-type.label: Firmware Checksum
channel-type.description: MD5 checksum of the firmware running on the device

channel-type.label: Implementation ID
channel-type.description: An identifier for the Homie implementation
